attributes.action: Introduced a staged driving license for car drivers as currently exists for motorcycles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, a young motorcyclist is restricted as to what size of machine he may ride upon passing his test, however, a 17 year old can pass his test and then drive any capacity, size or style of car with no account taken for experience and no requirement to increase personal skills.
